name: WinnieWrites
description:
In this game intended for a 4yo, you have to try and copy the words that are written in the top part of the screen. The twist is: you can't use your keyboard*! You have to make Winnie jump with the space bar to bump the letter you want. You can also move from left to right with the arrow keys. If you make a mistake, don't panic! Click on the eraser to delete the last letter you wrote.

Other clickable options include sound (on/off) and font: you have the choice between an all caps, simple font or a cursive one. Apart from the first one, words are random from a 101-words list in Spanish and English.

*Well okay, in a way you do use your keyboard.

Fonts used in the game:

Bebas Kai by Dharma Type
Homework Preschooler by hati
Little Days Alt by West Wind Fonts
Vademecum by Typodermic Fonts

Music :

Christmas Snowball Fight by FreeGroove

All code and graphisms by Tellington (with many thanks to Vallantyn for all of their help and teachings).
